channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: FBI Director Christopher Wray preparing to resign
item.description: FBI Director Christopher A. Wray plans to resign on or before Inauguration Day, The Washington Times has learned.

item.title: Prosecuting Daniel Penny Was An Irreparable Miscarriage Of Justice. New York Owes Him A Massive Payout.

item.title: Assad’s Downfall Proves Neocons Have Learned Nothing From Disastrous Middle East Meddling
item.description: Neocons jumped to celebrate the downfall of Assad, heedless of the power vacuum that will give opportunities to terrorists.

item.title: Godspeed to DOGE
item.description: Expectations for Elon Musk’s plan to root out government inefficiency need to be tempered, but we welcome the effort.

item.title: The Daniel Penny Verdict Is A Signal That The BLM Era Is Over
item.description: America is fed up with being intimidated by angry BLM activists.

item.title: The Cynical Sympathizers of Murder

item.title: Justice for Daniel Penny
item.description: The disgrace is that it was necessary for justice to be done in a courtroom. This case should never have been charged.
